name: Soohwan Kim
body:
### Biography
I am a PhD candidate in College of Engineering and Computer Science at [The Australian National University](http://www.anu.edu.au/) under the supervision of [Dr. Jonghyuk Kim](https://researchers.anu.edu.au/researchers/kim-j), [Dr. Hongdong Li](http://users.cecs.anu.edu.au/~hongdong/) and [Dr. Edwin Bonilla](http://users.cecs.anu.edu.au/~Edwin.Bonilla/). 
My PhD research topic is Bayesian non-parametric approaches to 3D mapping and reconstruction. To be more specific, I apply Gaussian and Dirichlet Processes to build occupancy maps and to reconstruct surfaces given observations from range sensors such as laser sensors and cameras.

I received my MS degree in Computer Science with Specialization in Intelligent Robotics at [University Southern California](http://www.usc.edu/) in 2004 and BS degree in Mechanical and Aerespace Engineering at [Seoul National University](http://www.useoul.edu/) in 2003. 

I was a research scientist in vision-based mobile robot navigation at [Korea Institute of Science and Technology](http://eng.kist.re.kr/) from 2007 to 2011 and a researcher in physics-based character animation at [Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute](http://www.etri.re.kr/eng) from 2005 to 2006.

### Research Interests
Machine Learning, Robotics, Computer Vision and Computer Graphics

### Selected Publications
- **Soohwan Kim** and Jonghyuk Kim, "Occupancy Mapping and Surface Reconstruction using Local Gaussian Processes with Kinect Sensors," _IEEE Transactions on Cybernetics_, Vol. 43, Iss. 5, pp. 1335 - 1346, 2013. [link](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/articleDetails.jsp?arnumber=6566014)

- **Soohwan Kim** and Jonghyuk Kim, "GPmap: A Unified Framework for Robotic Mapping Based on Sparse Gaussian Processes," Proceedings of International Conference on Field and Service Robotics, 2013. [link](http://www.araa.asn.au/fsr/fsr2013/papers/pap141s2.pdf)

- **Soohwan Kim** and Jonghyuk Kim, "Continuous Occupancy Maps using Overlapping Local Gaussian Processes," Proceedings of IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems, pp. 4709 - 4714, 2013. [link](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?arnumber=6697034)

- **Soohwan Kim** and Jonghyuk Kim, "Building Occupancy Maps with a Mixture of Gaussian Processes," Proceedings of IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation, pp. 4756 - 4761, 2012. [link](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/articleDetails.jsp?arnumber=6225355)

- **Soohwan Kim**, Dong Hwan Kim, Sung-Kee Park, "On-line Object Segmentation through Human-Robot Interaction," Proceedings of IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems, pp. 1734 - 1739, 2012. [link](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpls/abs_all.jsp?arnumber=5651041)

- **Soohwan Kim**, Dong Hwan Kim, Sung-Kee Park, "Vision-based Global Localization for Mobile Robots with Hybrid Maps of Objects and Spatial Layouts," Proceedings of IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems, pp. 1734 - 1739, 2012. [link](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpls/abs_all.jsp?arnumber=5651041)

### Awards
- Vice-Chancellor's HDR Travel Grant, ANU, 2013
- University Research Scholarship, ANU, 2011-2014
- Tuition Fee Exemption Sponsorship, ANU, 2011-2014
- Best Paper Finalist, ACRA, 2011
- Best Design at Robot Soccer Competition, USC, 2003
- Academic Achievement Scholarship, SNU, 2000-2003

### Professional Services
- Reviewer for IEEE Int'l Conference on Robotics and Automation 2011, 2012
- Reviewer for IEEE/RSJ Int'l Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems 2010, 2014
- Reviewer for IEEE Int'l Conference on Automation Science and Engineering 2014

### Technical Skills
- Programming Languages: C/C++, Java, and Matlab
- Software Libraries: [OpenCV](http://sourceforge.net/projects/opencvlibrary/), [PCL](http://pointclouds.org/), [ROS](http://www.ros.org/), [Eigen](http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/), [OpenMP](http://openmp.org/) and [Boost](http://www.boost.org/)
- Operating Systems: Linux and Windows
- Documentation: UML and [Doxygen](http://www.doxygen.org/)
- Downloadable Code Samples: [OpenGP](https://github.com/kimsoohwan/OpenGP) and [GPML](https://github.com/kimsoohwan/GPML)
